deal.features:
- If you're into drones or have general questions about drones, [check the Drone topic in our forum](https://meh.com/forum/topics/official-drone-talk-thread-deals-advice-cameras-flying-tips--more)
- Can fly for 15 minutes on a charge, at speeds up to 22mph
- GoPro mount for shooting aerial video
- Pitch lever on remote for control of optional gimbal 
- GPS system helps you fly it, and helps it fly home
- Model: CP.PT.000001 v1.1.1
deal.title: DJI Phantom 1 Quadcopter v1.1.1 with GoPro Mount
deal.specifications:
Specs 
==== 
**Phantom 1 with GoPro Mount** 

- Model: CP.PT.000001 v1.1.1
- NAZA-M v2 Autopilot System 
- GPS & Compass Module 
- R/C Receiver 
- LED Indicator 
- USB Interface (in the Battery Compartment) 
- ATTI./GPS ATTI. Mode 
- Intelligent Orientation Control 
- Hovering Accuracy (GPS Mode): Vertical: 0.8m (2.6 ft.), Horizontal: 2.5m (8.2 ft.) 
- Max Yaw Angular Velocity: 200°/s 
- Max Tilt Angle: 45° 
- Max Ascent/Descent Speed: 6m/s 
- Max Flight Velocity: 10m/s 
- Enhanced Fail-Safe 
- Low-Voltage Alert 
- Power Consumption: 3.12W 
- Charger AC Input: 100-240V 
- Charge Current: 1A/2A/3A 
- Current Drain For Balancing: 200A 
- Power: 20W 
- Battery Type: LiPo 
- Flight Time: 10-15 minutes 
- Dimensions: 350mm (13.8in) x 350mm (13.8in) x 190mm (7.5in) 
- Takeoff Weight: 1200g (2.7 Lbs.) 
- Camera Mount for GoPro (GoPro Camera NOT INCLUDED, but you can get one [here](http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1?tag=meh0ec-20url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=GoPro)) 

**Transmitter** 

- Working Frequency: 2.4Ghz ISM 
- Control Channel Numbers of Transmitter: 7 
- Communication Distance: 1000M (3281 ft.) 
- Reciever Sensitivity (1%PER): >-100dBm 
- Power Consumption of Transmitter: <20dBm 
- Working Current/Voltage: 52 mA@6V 
- 4x AA Batteries required 
- Dimensions: 290mm (11.4in) x 180mm (7.1in) x 50mm (2.0in) 

**Links** 

- [Manufacturer Specs](http://www.dji.com/product/phantom/spec) 
- [Quick Start Manual](http://download.dji-innovations.com/downloads/phantom/en/PHANTOM_Quick_Start_Manual_v1.7_en.pdf) 
- [Flying Flowchart (The Sparknotes version of the Quick Start Manual)](http://download.dji-innovations.com/downloads/phantom/en/PHANTOM_Flying_Flowchart_v1.0_en.pdf) 
- [Advanced Manual (More Technical stuff)](http://download.dji-innovations.com/downloads/phantom/en/PHANTOM_Advanced_Manual_en.pdf) 


**Condition:** New 
**Warranty:** 1 Year DJI
**Estimated Delivery:** 5/1 - 5/4
**Shipping:** $5 or free with **[VMP](https://mediocre.com/vmp)** 

What's in the Box? 
==== 
1x Phantom 1 Aircraft 
1x Transmitter 
1x Landing Gear (with Compass Module) 
1x Frame for Camera 
4x Propellers 
1x Assistant Wrench 
1x USB Cable 
1x Screw package (6x M3 screws) 
1x Rechargeable LiPo Battery Pack 
1x Battery Recharger 
3x Power Adapter Plugs: Type-A/C to Type-C, Type-A/C to Type-I, Type-A/C to Type-G 

Pictures 
==== 
[Phantom](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1429317267/yyizhisqn8113kw5gfcf.png)
[Whats in the box](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1429317163/fyq3ntdlscvg7blby6qb.png)
[Top view](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1429368108/svowl7cnfgypzy9h8oa0.png)
[Apple for scale](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1429379819/cnmzo50pf0gi7jexlnlh.png)
[UFO](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1429365611/kulqu1ucmzwpjieyowwt.png)
 
Price Check 
==== 
[$679.00 List, $479.00 at Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/DJI-Phantom-Aerial-Drone-Quadcopter/dp/B00AGOSQI8/ref=lh_ni_t?ie=UTF8&psc=1&smid=ATVPDKIKX0DER&tag=meh0ec-20)

story.title: Let's drone on and on.
story.body:
OK, so it looks like drones are turning out to be one of the rare hyped-up fancy-toys that are actually super ridiculously fun. [The last time we sold this DJI Phantom 1 Quadcopter](https://meh.com/forum/topics/dji-phantom-1-quadcopter-with-gopro-mount), they not only flew off the shelves (LMAO), they also attracted the attention of some quadcopter frea- er, obsessi- er, mania- ah, screw it, freaks who shared their hacks for pimping their rides in our forum.

Which gives us an idea to set up [a forum topic for people who wanna talk all things drone](https://meh.com/forum/topics/official-drone-talk-thread-deals-advice-cameras-flying-tips--more). Not just the drones that pop up in our daily deals - all drones from everywhere. Ask questions, show off your amazing mods, screen your aerial cam epics, post links to drone deals elsewhere. Get droney up in this mug.

If you're an addictive personality, walk away right now. But if you think you're ready for this heli, you're just a click of the "Buy It" button away from getting your fix. The DJI Phantom 1 is what most amateur drone pilots fly to earn their wings. It's the quadcopter that puts light unmanned aircraft within reach of the common man. (Financially within reach, not physically, necessarily, unless that common man is uncommonly tall.) If you're going to buy a quadcopter, and you don't want to spend the rest of your life parsing spec lists, play it safe with the DJI Phantom 1.

It flies for 15 minutes on a charge, hits top speeds of 22mph, and has a GoPro camera mount for stunning your friends with kick-ass aerial video. If you need more convincing that quadcoptering is the hobby for you, well, we know [a place where drone geeks will tell you all about it](https://meh.com/forum/topics/official-drone-talk-thread-deals-advice-cameras-flying-tips--more).

answers.text: Cleaning up the mess from my Earth Day party
Celebrating the feast of Johannes Bugenhagen
Going to Joey Lawrence's birthday party
I decline to answer on the grounds that it may incriminate me
Joining my fellow residents of WA, CO, OR, AK, or DC in celebrating our freedom
Same damn thing I do every Monday: go to work, come home, microwave a pizza, fall asleep in front of Antiques Roadshow
Some other thing I'll spark up in the forum
